metadata.title: USN-5606-1 -- poppler vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that poppler incorrectly handled certain PDF. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5606-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  poppler-utils - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.1 libpoppler-cpp-dev - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.1 libpoppler-glib-doc - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.1 gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.1 libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.1 libpoppler-glib8 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.1 libpoppler-private-dev - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.1 libpoppler-glib-dev - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.1 libpoppler-dev - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.1 libpoppler-qt5-dev - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.1 libpoppler-qt5-1 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.1 libpoppler118 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
